content:
Where do the instruction for the Q giver go (e.g. score it this way once they are done")? versus the Q takers (e.g. "circle all that apply")

docs say: "Display items allow the inclusion of instructions, background information and similar content within a questionnaire." assume instructions for test takers...
There's another extension that lets you control whether an item is to be included on entry, on rendering the results or both: http://hl7.org/fhir/extension-questionnaire-usagemode.html
(Feel free to ask Questionnaire-related questions on the #questionnaire thread :))
Ok thanks for the heads up - and the extension.
